pr_title: chore(broker): Keep records of active long polling requests

timeline.message: chore(broker): Keep records of active long polling requests

timeline.bodyText: Is this required? I think it is good not to change the versions when backporting.
timeline.author: deepthidevaki

replies.bodyText:
Required - yes and no
There was a security issue with the log4j library. On bumping the log4j version, then the Elasticsearch version had a dependency version conflict, so I bumped it, too.
I agree with your sentiment that changing versions during backport is not trivial. My personal rule of thumb is that I try to limit it to patch version changes only.
If you insist I can roll it back. In this case I would open another issue to bump the log4j version.
Please advise.
replies.author: pihme
